scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible churn prediction model deployed by a consumer banking institution. The attacker leverages model inversion techniques to infer customer income brackets and credit scores based on model predictions.
initial_goal: Determine the accuracy of the deployed customer churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large financial institution uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn based on anonymized data.  However, the model's outputs and its underlying architecture are vulnerable to model inversion techniques.
